attributes.action: Get rid of the food element from the tiering system to save wet led pubs
attributes.additional_details: hospitality have been singled out since the start of this pandemic many jobs in this sector have already been lost !! Breweries and pubs have spent thousands making their pubs covid safe yet still we remain targeted!with no evidence that it is a cause of infection! The food element does not help the hundreds of wet led pubs which are mainly in local communities and are an outlet for people who live on their own and is their only source of social interaction ! Take the food element away save jobs
attributes.background: Get rid of the food element in hospitality to enable the great British wet led pub most in local communities to be able to remain open and save jobs and livelihoods
